getAddresses.summary: Get addresses that are bound to the specific profileId

pathParams.name: profileId
pathParams.description: Unique identifier with a length of 66 characters

responses.description: The addresses that are bound to the speicifc profileId

requestBind.summary: Request bind between profile of two addresses
requestBind.description:
Request for message to bind profile that is belong to the two addresses
All profiles under the addresses will be bound and new profile will be generated.

bodyParam.description: The two addresses that are required to be bind.

fields.name: addresses
fields.description: An array of addresses that needs to be bind

fields.name: blockchainType
fields.description: The chain in which the address belongs to

fields.name: address
fields.description: Address performing the signing conformant to capitalization encoded checksum specified in EIP-55 where applicable.

fields.name: publicKey
fields.description: Public key performing the signing conformant. (This is only needed for Aptos address)

responses.description: The messages that is required to be signed by each of the address

fields.name: messages
fields.description: Message that needs to be signed by the end user
example:
Please sign this message to bind:
Profile Ids:
- 0x0b2bbac1251651c0cbbdbbb29fed5a03adc8b05a2a9eb10a02aaa489b9c1f8ff

with

Address: 0x6ed338bcB610640e81465FCfb9894DDfA354Cc91
Nonce: 5pXWu7aGkY2J7II0X

Please sign this message to bind:

- 0x0b2bbac1251651c0cbbdbbb29fed5a03adc8b05a2a9eb10a02aaa489b9c1f8ff

with
